data.title: Add a DevCommand for enabling the minimap
data.body: I don't know about you, but I really need my minimap, and I'm really tired of starting 20 games with an average length of 25 seconds when debugging something and having to deploy my MCV and build a radar each time.

data.title: Remove version information from NuGet folder names
data.body:
This makes the names consistent and prevents changes in versions of
dependencies from breaking the build.

If you like this I can update the .ps1 and -windows scripts as well.

data.title: Made JamsMissiles and Hovers classes public
data.body: I want to base the first public version of one of my projects on the upcoming release, so if at all possible, I'd like to see this merged before the release so I won't have to ship a custom Mods.Common.dll.

data.title: Spawn Dev Cheat
data.body:
A cheat that could spawn any actor.
Say /spawn doggie - Spawns the Tiberian Fiend at the cursor location.
/spawn gaspot - Spawns gaspot attaches to cursor and allows placing it as a ordinary building.

This would be a nice solution for what should be Buildable: Prerequisites: ~disabled what should not argument, cause then everything would still be accessible if its needed to be tested without cluttering the UI even tho it isn't Buildable anymore.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/10774519-spawn-dev-cheat?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Add TerrainHeightAt to Map.
data.body:
Adds height-awareness to Cargo and some other traits that shouldn't use `Z == 0`, like we currently do.

To test this try un/loading some passengers on elevated terrain in TS.

data.title: Fix issues in Allies01 and Monster Tank Madness
Player color validation: still not enough contrast to terrain
data.body:
Despite the color validation colors that are too close to terrain can still be chosen (and are actually even auto-suggested after color validation "strike").

![hard_2_see](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10639257/7043746/69cd609e-ddec-11e4-82bd-8b28fa6cb54d.jpg)

Fixing it would also boost significance of the stealth units.

Random color suggestions need work too (example: first suggest colors of all available hues before repeating a hue ...)

data.title: "Password protected" font color in RA server browser is unreadable.
data.body:
![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/756669/7039128/5026cd6c-ddbd-11e4-972a-7935be38f915.png)

This should be changed to a different shade of red.  Ideally this colour should be customizable per-mod via ChromeMetrics.

data.title: Allow toggling the UI with a /toggleui dev command.
data.body: Closes #6779

data.title: Disable color validation when colors are locked.
data.body: As a map maker, it is pretty annoying to pick out a specific colour and have the game change it on you even though you have "locked" it.

data.title: Add UnloadTerrainTypes to Cargo.
data.body: Useful for the RA2 amphibious transport.

data.title: Fixed empty pixels on flak truck art
data.body:
old:
![ftrk-old](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2857877/7027781/cf7e4200-dd51-11e4-9341-4d7589882dd1.png)

new:
![ftrk-new](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2857877/7027785/d85558c8-dd51-11e4-9fd9-99f5e79b7322.png)

data.title: Tweaks RA and TD helicopter weapon minimum ranges
data.body:
As well as their AG missile MaximumPitch, to prevent them from shooting at targets they cannot hit.

Fixes the 2nd part of #7499.

data.title: Server browser: Notification sound for newly listed games
data.body:
A notification sound in the server browser once there are new games matching the list criteria could be helpful.

I always miss when people are rehosting their games and (at least in play tests) it's already really hard to get a multiplayer game.

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/10646717-server-browser-notification-sound-for-newly-listed-games?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Fix issues in latest playtest
data.body:
Fixes #7890 
Fixes #7893

data.title: Server browser: Mark if a game in progress is password protected
data.body:
If you're searching for a multiplayer game and there are currently none available, you might search to see if there are any in progress (to join them once they are rehosted) and if you leave the "list protected games" switch on (which is the **default**), the server browser won't warn you which ones are protected. So you're potentially waiting for players who want to play privately and will probably also rehost with password.

Mark protected games in progress as "In Progress (protected)"

data.title: RA Flak Truck art has color 0 in places that should be black
Helicopters should move backwards when target is closer than MinRange
data.body: Currently they just sit there doing nothing, if the target is too close.

data.title: Opponents get "(Ally)" suffix in FFA multiplayer chat
data.body: Seen in a D2k multiplayer game.

data.title: TD orca uses wrong sequences for movement
data.body:
Currently it always uses frames 1-32, and only uses 33-64 if damaged.

The correct behavior would be to use frames 1-32 for idle (standing still in the air, landed) and frames 33-64 when moving.

data.title: Added gates
data.body:
Took me quite long to actually get this working. It is not final quality, both from architectural related things (should probably inherit from the Building trait, but I could not get that to work due to trait inter-dependencies) and feature wise (the pathfinder still ignores friendly closed gates), but you need to start somewhere. You can use http://resource.openra.net/maps/2738 for testing.

Depends on the cleanups from https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7887.

data.title: Unhardcoded and self-documented render sequences
data.body: This exposes our default sequence name "idle" to https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/wiki/Traits.

data.title: Crashes running openra (red alert mod) in dedicated server mode on linux (Ubuntu 14.04.2 LTS)
data.body:
It seems like my dedicated OpenRA server crashes after an hour or so of uptime. I have no idea why this is happening.

the server is launched via the following command (on a screen session)
screen -dmS openra_ded_ra mono --debug OpenRA.Game.exe Game.Mod=ra Server.Dedicated=True Server.DedicatedLoop=True Server.Name=Cinqore AB RA [ www.cinqore.se ] Server.ListenPort=1235 Server.ExternalPort=123

Here are some log files created from my server instance:

http://pastebin.com/0LuP81fJ        perf.log
http://pastebin.com/AvnVYHPn     server.log
http://pastebin.com/xgQijJWs        exeption.log

data.title: Fix crash in TD's server creation dialog
data.body: Fixes #7884

data.title: Possible renderer issue related to sprite bounds
data.body:
There is a black line at the bottom of TS' original alphatst.shp (1 pixel below the shp's lower bound, to be precise) when using Multiplicative or DoubleMultiplicative blending.
It appears that this only happens with odd shp bounds, changing the canvas to 279x140 adds a black line to the right instead. 

Sequences that don't using blending do not have this issue.

I've occasionally spotted similar black lines when voxels were facing specific directions, but that is harder to reproduce.

data.title: Pausing/going to ingame menu does not exit building placement mode
data.body: The building preview will happily continue following the mouse.

data.title: Misc ra balance changes, pt. 2
data.body:
More changes based on past discussions on IRC and the forums.
- Kills any confusion regarding vanilla factions vs specialised factions by removing the vanilla factions from MP/skirmish
- Reworks Russia completely to make it Tesla themed because MAD Tank and Armour Airdrop weren't very powerful or particularly exciting
- France inherits the fake structures from vanilla Allies, and loses advanced gap generator
- Build limit of 1 for the fake missile silo and fake chronosphere
- Buffs Ukraine's parabombs and gives both Russia and Ukraine (!) paratroopers

Closes #7869

data.title: Added the Tiberian Sun crates
data.body: This sets up the crate and adds most features. Reference: http://cnc.wikia.com/wiki/Crate_(Tiberian_Sun)

data.title: Disable Nuke function in Red Alert
data.body:
I like to disable Nuke for everyone when I create a server.
Sometime it is fun to use Nuke but most of the time I like to use tanks and that to win a game.
